original_title: Tradition ist die Weitergabe des Feuers und nicht die Anbetung der Asche
overview: The pictures are burning. A house is in flames for exactly one minute.  Cinema under attack: An anonymous fragment from the early days of film is turned into a reflection on reproduction and reality as well as on destruction which takes place on two levels through Gustav Deutschâ€™s reworking of the material.
title: Tradition Is the Handing on of Fire and Not the Worship of Ashes
